mapper.select: SELECT platformId, platformType, platformName, phoneNumber, postageArea, postageFee, advImg, province, city, area, address, longitude, latitude FROM sys_platform WHERE platformType = #{platformType}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_platform ( platFormType, platformName, phoneNumber, postageArea, postageFee, advImg, province, city, area, address, longitude, latitude ) VALUES ( #{platFormType}, #{platformName}, #{phoneNumber}, #{postageArea}, #{postageFee}, #{advImg}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{address}, #{longitude}, #{latitude} )
